Everyone on the bus screamed as they saw Peter's mouth approaching them, some kids puking, others laughing hysterically

Peter was bored and tired of this class, even though it had barely started. He wanted to be at the gym, so he could get rid of the pounds he had gained over the winter break. His mouth was open in a giant yawn, when he felt something fly into it. He figured it was a gnat, as he had swallowed plenty of gnats before whenever he went for a run. He closed his mouth and gulped, sending the bus down into his belly. He absentmindedly rubbed his stomach, as it let out a gurgle.

Inside Peter's stomach, the bus fell through the smelly air, before landing on a pile of scrambled eggs. Peter had eaten a giant breakfast of eggs, bacon, toast and orange juice, and he had a slow metabolism, so his food often sat in his belly, yet he was always hungry. info.brief_description: A school bus unknowingly takes a small detour into David's & Jamie's reproductive system.
info.description:
A school bus intended for just a normal drop-off at school gets sidetracked on a voyage into the unknown. David ordered a shrink ray and was on his way out the door when he tripped and fell, shrinking the school bus that was coming for him. Now, the students, teachers (2), and bus driver are in for the ride of their lives as they journey into the unknown of David's and Jamie's (his girlfriend) reproductive system and sex life.

Requirements:
1. Keep David and Jamie unaware of the school bus, but if they do find them, they treat them as insects or dolls. I would prefer this most of the time, but its up to you to make the choice.
2. Please use and perform spellcheck!
3. No one-word or one-sentence chapters.

Note: 1000 GIFT POINTS for each quality submission. I promise you it will be worth your while!
